duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quality patient care in a critical, clinical, and technical environment for patients undergoing non-invasive, invasive, and interventional cardiac procedures.

Deliver direct nursing care to patients undergoing electrophysiologic procedures, including pre-EPS teaching, clinical monitoring, emergency assistance, medication administration, hemodynamic monitoring, and arrhythmia induction monitoring.
Assist in the preparation, operation, and termination of procedural equipment specific to diagnostic and interventional EP procedures.
Manage the company's online presence, optimizing the website and social media channels for maximum engagement and conversions.
Plan and oversee participation in industry events, conferences, and trade shows to showcase services.
Measure and report on the performance of patient care and procedures, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.
